issue.title: [Python][Doc] pyarrow.FixedSizeListArray does not appear in the documentation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13101](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13101). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I'm not sure why as it seems to be documented properly in the code.  However, if I search the docs for it nothing comes up.  Note that pyarrow.ListArray and pyarrow.LargeListArray are there.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13101?focusedCommentId=17364727) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
I suppose it's just an accidental omission, would be good to at least add it to `docs/source/python/api/arrays.rst`

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13101?focusedCommentId=17364938) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10545
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10545>
